marklogic.body: Oil companies need to move into the 21st century. Oil products have been killing the earth for far too long. It is disgusting that these people put profits over everything else, when so much is at stake. Us, and them have a co-dependant relationship that is very unhealthy. We upon them to provide us with our energy needs. And they Depend upon us for money. The only way this is going to change is if someone takes a step foreward. They will not change, because we enable them. It is too easy for them. So, we need to show them that we are not going to tolerate their ignorance, and greed. How? you ask? Well, the only obvious solutions are either to boycott, or start demanding much more efficient energy use technology! There are far more efficient forms of energy available today, and far more efficient means of producing energy today. Some of you may not know that Hydrogen is one of them. It is the most abundant substance in the Universe! And when combusted, the combustion by-product is water, with residual Heat! Sound too good to be true? Well its not. Its reality!
